title.costRankingDescription: View user cost rankings, data updates every 5 minutes
title.usageLogsDescription: View API call logs and usage statistics
title.sessionMonitoringDescription: Real-time display of active and inactive sessions (auto-refresh every 3 seconds)
title.quotasManagementDescription: View and manage quotas at all levels

description.viewApiCallLogs: View API call logs and usage statistics
description.dashboard: View system statistics and monitoring information
description.quotas: View and manage quotas at all levels
description.requestMessagesDescription: Message content sent by the client

logs.title: Usage Logs
logs.description: View and analyze API call records

stats.title: Statistics Summary
stats.description: Click to view aggregated statistics for the current filters

details.title: Request Details
details.error: Request failed, here are the detailed error messages and provider decision chain
details.processing: Request is in progress, not yet completed

skipped.title: Skipped
skipped.desc: This request was identified as a Warmup probe and was answered directly by CCH without forwarding to upstream providers; it is not billed, not rate-limited, and excluded from statistics.

modelRedirect.title: Model Redirection
modelRedirect.billingDescription: The system prioritizes billing based on the price of the requested model ({original}). If the model is not found in the price list, the price of the actually called model ({current}) is used.
modelRedirect.billingDescription_original: Current billing mode: Using original model before redirection ({original}) for billing
modelRedirect.billingDescription_redirected: Current billing mode: Using actual model after redirection ({current}) for billing

noError.processing: Request is being processed, awaiting response...

details.clickStatusCode: Click status code to view full timeline

leaderboard.title: Cost Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: View cost statistics rankings for users and keys

states.weekNoData: No data available for this week
states.monthNoData: No data available for this month

permission.title: Permission Required
permission.description: The leaderboard feature requires administrators to enable the "Allow Global Usage View" permission.
permission.userAction: Please contact an administrator to enable this permission.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Monitor current active API sessions in real-time
sessions.monitoringDescription: Real-time display of active and inactive sessions (auto-refresh every 3 seconds)

details.title: Session Messages
details.storageTip: No detailed data found. To view request details, please check if the environment variable STORE_SESSION_MESSAGES is set to true. Note: Enabling this increases Redis memory usage and may include sensitive information.
details.requestMessagesDescription: Message content sent by the client

actions.terminateDescription: Are you sure you want to terminate this session? After termination, the provider binding for this session will be cleared, and the next request will reselect a provider.
actions.terminateSessionDescription: Are you sure you want to terminate this session? This action cannot be undone.
actions.noSelection: Please select at least one session

hardLimit.title: Content too large
hardLimit.hint: Please download the file to view the full content.

status.storageNotEnabledHint: Tip: Set environment variable STORE_SESSION_MESSAGES=true to enable messages storage

quotas.title: Quota Management
quotas.description: Manage user, key, and provider usage quotas

mode.keys: Only display usage statistics for your keys
mode.mixed: Display your key details and aggregated data from other users
mode.users: Display usage statistics for all users

emptyState.title: No Keys
emptyState.description: Click the "Add Key" button in the top right corner to add a key

actions.customRenewDescription: Set a new expiration date for user {userName}
actions.customPrompt: Enter a new expiry date (YYYY-MM-DD). Leave empty to cancel.

emptyState.title: No Users
emptyState.description: You haven't created any users yet. Users are the foundation for managing API keys and usage quotas. Create your first user to get started!

keyCreatedDialog.title: Key Created Successfully
keyCreatedDialog.description: Your API key has been created successfully. Please copy and save it securely, as it will only be displayed once.
keyCreatedDialog.warningText: Please copy and save before closing. You will not be able to view this key again after closing.
keyCreatedDialog.httpWarningText: HTTP access detected. Browser restrictions prevent clipboard access. Click the eye icon to reveal the key and copy manually.

addKeyForm.title: Add Key
addKeyForm.description: Create a new API key for the current user. The key value will be auto-generated.

canLoginWebUi.label: Allow Web UI Login
canLoginWebUi.description: When disabled, this key can only be used for API calls and cannot login to the admin panel

desc.fixed: Reset quota at a specific time each day

dailyResetTime.label: Daily Reset Time
dailyResetTime.description: When the daily limit resets (uses system timezone)

providerGroup.label: Provider Group
providerGroup.placeholder: Enter provider group tags, press Enter to add
providerGroup.description: Provider groups for this key (default: default).
providerGroup.descriptionWithUserGroup: Provider groups for this key (user groups: {group}; default: default).

addKeyForm.successDescription: Your API key has been created successfully.

generatedKey.label: Generated Key
generatedKey.hint: You can manage this key in the key list (enable/disable, quotas, etc.), but the full key is only shown once. Copy it now.

errors.createFailed: Failed to create, please try again later
errors.noKeyReturned: Created successfully but key was not returned

description.add: Create a new user. The system will automatically generate a default key.

note.label: Note
note.description: Used to describe the user's purpose or notes

providerGroup.label: Provider Group
providerGroup.description: User provider groups (default: default). Providers without groupTag belong to default.

tags.label: User Tags
tags.description: Add tags for categorization and filtering (max 20 tags, 32 characters each)

isEnabled.label: Enable User
isEnabled.description: Disabled users cannot access the API

expiresAt.label: Expiration Date
expiresAt.description: User will be automatically disabled after expiration

allowedClients.label: Allowed Clients
allowedClients.description: Restrict which CLI/IDE clients can use this account. Leave empty for no restrictions.

allowedModels.label: Allowed Models
allowedModels.placeholder: Enter model name (press Enter to add)
allowedModels.description: Restrict this user to specific AI models. Leave empty for no restrictions (max 50 models, 64 chars each)

deleteKeyConfirm.title: Confirm Delete Key

errors.retryError: Delete failed, please try again later

availability.title: Provider Availability Monitor
availability.description: Real-time monitoring of provider availability and performance metrics

rateLimits.title: Rate Limit Event Statistics
rateLimits.description: View and analyze statistics for rate limit events
rateLimits.noDataHint: No rate limit events in the selected time range

chart.title: Rate Limit Timeline
chart.description: Hourly trend of rate limit events

breakdown.title: Rate Limit Type Breakdown
breakdown.description: Share of events by rate limit type

topUsers.title: Top Affected Users
topUsers.description: Users who triggered rate limits most frequently

dialog.userProviderGroupHint: New keys can only use your existing provider groups.

quickRenew.title: Quick Renew
quickRenew.description: Set a new expiration date for user {userName}
quickRenew.quickExtensionHint: Extend from current expiry (or from now if expired)

editDialog.title: Edit user
editDialog.atLeastOneKeyEnabled: At least one key must be enabled

dialog.title: Batch Edit
dialog.noFieldEnabled: Please enable at least one field to override
dialog.noSelection: Please select users or keys to batch edit first.

confirm.title: Confirm Batch Update
confirm.description: This will update {users} users and {keys} keys. This action cannot be undone.

placeholders.groupPlaceholder: Leave empty to clear, comma-separated for multiple

createDialog.title: Create user
createDialog.description: Create a new user and configure API keys
createDialog.rollbackFailed: Rollback failed. The user may have been created without a key. Please delete the user manually (userId: {userId}) and try again.
createDialog.successDescription: User and key have been created
createDialog.keyHint: You can manage this key from the user management page (enable/disable, quotas, etc.), but the full key is only shown once. Copy it now.
createDialog.confirmRemoveKeyDescription: Are you sure you want to remove the key "{name}"?

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: The following actions are irreversible, proceed with caution

enable.title: Enable User
enable.description: After enabling, this user and their keys will resume normal operation
enable.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to enable user "{userName}"?

disable.title: Disable User
disable.description: After disabling, this user and their keys will no longer be usable
disable.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to disable user "{userName}"?

delete.title: Delete User
delete.description: This will delete all associated data for this user, this action cannot be undone
delete.confirmDescription: This action will delete all associated data for user "{userName}" and cannot be undone.

errors.enableFailed: Failed to enable user, please try again later
errors.disableFailed: Failed to disable user, please try again later
errors.deleteFailed: Failed to delete user, please try again later

balanceQueryPage.label: Enable dedicated balance page
balanceQueryPage.description: Allow users to view their balance via a dedicated page
balanceQueryPage.descriptionEnabled: When enabled, this key will access an independent personal usage page upon login. However, it cannot modify its own key's provider group.
balanceQueryPage.descriptionDisabled: When disabled, the user cannot access the personal usage page UI. Instead, they will use the restricted Web UI.

allowedClients.label: Client Restrictions
allowedClients.description: Restrict which CLI/IDE clients can use this account. Empty = no restriction.

allowedModels.label: Model Restrictions
allowedModels.placeholder: Enter model name or select from dropdown
allowedModels.description: Restrict which AI models this user can access. Empty = no restriction.

enableStatus.label: Enable Status
enableStatus.enabledDescription: Currently enabled. Disabling will prevent this user and their keys from being used.
enableStatus.disabledDescription: Currently disabled. Enabling will restore normal access for this user and their keys.
enableStatus.confirmEnableDescription: Enabling will restore normal access for this user and their keys.
enableStatus.confirmDisableDescription: Disabling will prevent this user and their keys from being used.

enableStatus.label: Enable Status
enableStatus.cannotDisableTooltip: Cannot disable the last enabled key

balanceQueryPage.label: Independent Personal Usage Page
balanceQueryPage.description: When enabled, this key can access an independent personal usage page
balanceQueryPage.descriptionEnabled: When enabled, this key will access an independent personal usage page upon login. However, it cannot modify its own key's provider group.
balanceQueryPage.descriptionDisabled: When disabled, the user cannot access the personal usage page UI. Instead, they will use the restricted Web UI.

providerGroup.label: Provider Group
providerGroup.selectHint: Select the provider group(s) this key can use (default: default).
providerGroup.editHint: Provider group cannot be changed for existing keys.

cacheTtl.label: Cache TTL Override
cacheTtl.description: Force Anthropic prompt cache TTL for requests containing cache_control.

limitRules.title: Add limit rule
limitRules.overwriteHint: This type already exists, saving will overwrite the existing value

webhookMigration.title: Webhook System Upgrade
webhookMigration.description: We have launched a new Webhook notification system with multi-target delivery, independent configuration, and improved reliability.

step1.title: Legacy Webhook Configuration Detected
step1.description: The system detected that you are using legacy Webhook configuration. The new system offers more powerful features, and we recommend migrating.

step2.title: Select Platform Type
step2.description: The following Webhook URLs could not be automatically identified. Please select the platform manually:

webhookMigration.successDescription: Your Webhook configuration has been successfully migrated to the new system.
webhookMigration.errorGeneric: Migration failed. Please try again later.
